front.title: User Assigned ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 Codes and the DNS Root Zone

abstract.t: The ISO 3166 standard is used for the definition of eligible designations for country code Top Level Domains. This standard is maintained by the ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency. The ISO 3166 standard contains a set of User-Assigned code elements. This document describes that these values can be used as top level domains for private DNS resolution.
